column4: Okay since no one answered me, here is the short question: Can i reset all monitor stuff so I can just reboot and it will (try to) detect all monitors again?

I'm also on a dual monitor set up, not sure if this will help you or not, but I don't plug mine in until I'm fully booted, and then i have to open the Monitor preferences for the other monitor to be detected.
that would be nice but why did it work before today? :D
